definition: to report for criticism/to submit for approval to higher authority
to ascertain/to act on/to criticize/to pass on/classifier for batches, lots, military flights/tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)

sentences.english: The project has already achieved local government planning approval and is now waiting to move to the next stage of design development.
sentences.chinese: 该项目已通过政府报批审核，正等待深化设计的开始。

sentences.english: The entity shall be imposed upon a warning or be circularized a criticism.
sentences.chinese: 对单位给予警告或者通报批评。

sentences.english: Experience in new drug certificates or production licenses is more favorable.
sentences.chinese: 具有新药证书或生产批件注册报批的经历者优先。

sentences.english: The concerned unit shall be given a warning or be criticized in a circulated notice.
sentences.chinese: 对单位给予警告或者通报批评。

sentences.english: LAN got a criticized such as sword, made up his mind to give up drinking.
sentences.chinese: 兰如剑得了个通报批评，下定决心戒酒。

sentences.english: The entity shall be imposed upon a warning or circularized a criticism.
sentences.chinese: 对单位给予警告或者通报批评。

sentences.english: Documentation of new product introduction and approval such as PPAP documents.
sentences.chinese: 提交新品引进和报批的相关文档如PPAP文件。

sentences.english: The unit shall be given a warning or be criticized in a circulated notice.
sentences.chinese: 对单位给予警告或者通报批评。

definition: to report for judgment/to submit for approval
to reply officially to a subordinate
environmental impact assessment (EIA)/abbr. for 環境影響評估|环境影响评估
to report, requesting approval/written request for instructions
to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
to examine sth and make a decision/to screen/to evaluate/to approve
official written ruling in response to a submission/official approval in writing
to report to one's superiors/to appear in the news/to reply to a letter
